class.name: LBFGSBSolver
class.brief_description: The LBFGSBSolver class provides an implementation of the L-BFGSB optimization algorithm.
class.description: L-BFGSB (Limited-memory Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno with Bounds) is a variant of the L-BFGS optimization algorithm that supports bound constraints. It is not as robust as L-BFGS and has a time complexity of O(N*M), where N is the number of variables and M is the number of iterations.

method.name: _call_operator
method.description: This method is used to calculate the function value and its gradient at a given point x.

method.name: minimize
method.description: This method is used to find the minimum of the function starting from the initial guess x, subject to the given lower and upper bounds.
